info.description: Marketo Marketing Automation. This API provides access to Marketo objects such as Campaigns, Programs, Leads, Lists (Static and Smart) as well as filesystem assets such as files and folders.
info.title: Marketo MA

Field to use for deduplication. Custom fields (string, email, integer), and the following field types are supported: id, cookies, email, twitterId, facebookId, linkedInId, sfdcAccountId, sfdcContactId, sfdcLeadId, sfdcLeadOwnerId, sfdcOpptyId. Default is email.

get.description:
Returns the file content of an export job. The export job must be in "Completed" state. Use Get Export Lead Job Status endpoint to retrieve status of export job. Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead

The file format is specified by calling the Create Export Lead Job endpoint. The following is an example of the default file format ("CSV").

firstName,lastName,email
Marvin,Gaye,marvin.gaye@motown.com

parameters.description: Id of export batch job.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Id of export batch job.

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: To support partial retrieval of extracted data, the HTTP header "Range" of type "bytes" may be specified.  See RFC 2616 "Range Retrieval Requests" for more information. If the header is not set, the entire contents will be returned.
parameters.x-ms-summary: To support partial retrieval of extracted data

get.description: Returns a list of up to 300 leads based on a list of values in a particular field.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead

parameters.name: filterType
parameters.description:
The lead field to filter on. Any custom field (string, email, or integer types only), and any of the following fields are supported: cookies, email, facebookId, id, leadPartitionId, linkedInId, sfdcAccountId, sfdcContactId, sfdcLeadId, sfdcLeadOwnerId, sfdcOpptyId, twitterId.

A comprehensive list of fields can be obtained via the Describe Lead2 endpoint.
parameters.x-ms-summary: The lead field to filter on.

parameters.name: filterValues
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of values to filter on in the specified fields.
